body.name: The Highlander’s Virgin Wife: A Medieval Historical Romance Novel (English Lasses in Scotland Book 4)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Started With A Kiss
reviews.reviewText: The Highlanders Virgin Wife Book 4 : English Lasses In Scotland Eloise Madigan finishes the series with the last friend of the trio. This time the Lady is escaping an unwanted betrothal to an Earl who she has no feeling for what so ever. She wants Adventure , Passion , and Love. Is this too much to ask for ? With one last chance before her doomed marriage , she strikes a deal with a Handsome Laird . What can happen in two weeks alone at his castle asking for a Simple Kiss ? Sit back and take the Journey. It is Thrilling, Exciting, Secretive, and guaranteed to touch you !Lady Keira Webster was the daughter of a Duke . Prim , proper and do what you are told l That is how she was raised. Nothing about what she wanted or felt.Ralphael Anderson Laird MacCurtney was a man with a past that weighed heavily on his heart . He felt he wasn’t worthy of happiness because of the things that he had done in his past. Avoiding marriage at any cost. His Mother had other plans for him to find a wife.Keira and Ralphael meet at her friends castle in Scotland. There was an instant chemistry between them. Throwing caution to the wind she asks him for a Kiss. He said only if you come to my Castle for 2 Weeks . Living on the wild side she accepts. There are twists and turns that follow. Some danger. She wants Love and He is to afraid to give in. Can the Heart Win ?A Romantic Tale that just takes you by storm. Warm, Fuzzy and Hoping for that Happily Ever After !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chemistry and Adventure!
reviews.reviewText: Keira Webster is betrothed to the Earl of Hall who is a good man, but boring. She longs for some excitement and adventure, and travels to Scotland to visit two of her closest friends before the wedding is to take place.While visiting, she meets a handsome Scottish Laird Raphael Mac Curtney, who is visiting their castle to form an alliance with the Laird Mac Shaw. He is charming with lots of charisma, and a good man.Keira is drawn to him and wants just one kiss to find out what it is like. He is attracted to her, too, so they make a deal. He will kiss her if she comes to his castle for a visit. She agrees. The sparks fly!His betrothed, Violet, who is beautiful, charming, and looking forward to marrying Raphael, arrives at the castle the next day. Keira did not know he was betrothed. He did not want to be betrothed, but his mom was pushing him toward a wedding.His first wife died in an accident, but he suspects she and her unborn child were murdered and was trying to find the man he suspected was responsible. He felt like anyone he married could be in danger until this situation is resolved. So the plot thickens. It was an adventure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love, lies, heartache, danger and betrayal
reviews.reviewText: What a story! While visiting her friends in Scotland, Keira was introduced to Raphael Anderson, Laird MacCurtney. Her reaction to him was immediate, strong and confusing. Wanting a little adventure before she was stuck in an arranged and loveless marriage, Keira asked him for a kiss. So he made a deal with her. He would kiss her, but she needed to stay at his castle for two weeks as his guest. At the end of those two weeks, she was to leave and never see him again. What follows is a story wherein conflicting emotions abound. Lies are told, feelings are hurt, hearts are broken, danger lurks and lives are endangered. There are close calls, steamy kisses and multiple surprises, not the least of which is Raphael’s past profession. The story flows at a good clip, is full of emotional ups and downs and reminds us that ‘Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned’! As always with this author, I found that once I started reading, I could not put it down! Loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exciting Love Story
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed this book. Raphael and Keira had true love and he had heartbreak from his first wife being murdered. But life worked out for them and Rose was loved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are forced into marriage, but fate has other plans for these two. Raphael takes Kiera up on her request that leads to an arranged marriage. When love blossoms between them Raphael is concerned about his past and its implication for the future. Will he be able to keep his new bride safe.This story had me glued to the pages from start to finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Highlander’s Virgin Wife
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyed reading this book! I really liked how they danced around each other when it came to sex and ultimately waited until their wedding to consummate their marriage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be careful what you ask for.
reviews.reviewText: Lady Keira Webster was destined to marry a kind but very dull earl. She decided to visit two of her best friends who happened to be married to Scottish lairds. While visiting, she decided she wanted, for just once, to know what it felt like to be truly kissed. At a Scottish celebration, she met a laird who agreed to kiss her. In payment for this, he asked her to stay in his castle with his family for two weeks. He hoped her presence would discourage his mother from trying to marry him off. This sets the stage for a captivating tale of romance and intrigue among characters you will want to follow until the very end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The story kept teasing secrets but never revealed answers
reviews.reviewText: I had a very difficult time getting invested in this story. I found too much of it to be pointless repetition and blathering on about unnecessary things. Many of the descriptions were inconsistent with the characters and the pretentious wording didn’t help.The answer to the laird’s secret was something I didn’t expect, but since it was never explained, I’m not sure I consider it a positive to the book.

Keira is engaged to A man she doesn't have chemistry for. She meets Raphael at her friends house and they have crazy chemistry. She agrees to spend 2 weeks at his house. Her parents find out and demand they marry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A must for all those that love a Scottish Romance.
reviews.reviewText: Well from beginning to end it was full of surprises. Thrills, romance, the villain who is revealed at last and the hero who is truly a hero.

Lady Keira takes matters into her own hands while trying to test the wicked Raphael Anderson Laird MacCurtney. They are forced into a marriage of convenience against their will but find their emotions changing for the better. A great and enjoyable read. I received this book free and leave a honest review. I recommend this book to other readers.
